!Gatekeeper Mirabel: As much as I've traveled, even I can't claim to understand all the peoples in this wide world. Our Elven Forest is a peaceful haven, but the outside world also has much to offer -- especially a bustling place like Giran. Only through interacting with outsiders can we better understand not only this world, but ultimately ourselves. [Quest _007_ATripBegins mint_q0007_0104.htm|"I want to see the world!"]
